RemediationStrings.Title: BitLocker protection is not enabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: BitLocker protection status is {ActualValue}. Please contact your support desk to resolve this issue.

RemediationStrings.Title: The encryption method used with BitLocker does not meet corporate compliance.
RemediationStrings.Description: BitLocker encryption method is currently set to {ActualValue}, but should be XtsAes256. Please contact your support desk to resolve this issue.

RemediationStrings.Title: BitLocker encryption is not complete
RemediationStrings.Description: The BitLocker encryption is currently at {ActualValue}%. If this is a new computer please wait for encryption to complete - if not, contact your support desk to resolve this issue.

RemediationStrings.Title: The drive is not fully encrypted by BitLocker.
RemediationStrings.Description: The drive should be fully encrypted with BitLocker. If this is a new computer please wait for encryption to complete - if not, contact your support desk to resolve this issue.
